name: Figma Cover Thumbnail Templates
description:
Hello Figmates! Hope everyone is doing amazing and staying inspired.


I created some templates for my product design team and thought to share with the community.


So, for all the design and scrum teams with a process in place these templates will help you keep a clean and easily readable project and file overview. They are color-coded to give you a synopsis of the project and file statuses at a glance.


This file includes 6 covers depicted as steps based on your team's process.


💡 Exploration

⏰ In progress

😎 Ready for dev

🔬 Design QA

✅ Done

🌷 Resource


All covers are:

  • easily customizable to adopt to your needs
  • created with autolayout to embrace content nicely
  • technically crafted using Figma's recommended frame dimensions of 1920x960 including a safe zone area to ensure all thumbnails always display optimally


Enjoy, feel free to duplicate and/or express your love with a ♡


Have feedback? Let me know @Konstantina__C on Twitter. ✌️
